name: explorer
description: This is the original explorer.vim plugin from Vim 6.4. As of Vim 7.0 this functionality is provided by the netrw.vim plugin but I prefer the original.
install_details:
mkdir -p ~/.vim/plugin
cp explorer.vim !$

Add the following to your vimrc:
let loaded_netrw=1
let loaded_netrwPlugin=1
